transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Haanji sir, very good evening sir.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Abhimanyu Singh baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se senior manager.
Customer: Thank you sir. Bahut bahut dhanyavad sir aapka bahut bahut dhanyavad sir. Nahi nahi thank you sir. Abhi madam ka call aaya tha baat kar li. Thank you very much sir.
Executive: Sir aapka negative feedback aaya hai uske related maine sir call kiya hai aapko right?
Customer: Nahi nahi sir bahut bahut dhanyavad sir koi dikkat nahi hai mere paas sir wo madam se baat ho gayi sir na hamara.
Executive: To sir feedback aapke side se aaya hai to hum log discuss karke sir isko resolve bhi kar sakte hai sir jo issue hai aapka.
Customer: Koi resolution nahi hai sir IndiaMART ke paas koi resolution nahi hai hum bahut baar baat kar chuke IndiaMART ke paas koi resolution nahi hai to mere paas bhi faltu time nahi hai aur mujhe karwana bhi nahi hai ab ye maan lo aap.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Resolution karwana nahi hai. Mujhe nahi karwana sir resolution mere paas time nahi hai. Thank you very much. Bahut bahut dhanyavad aapka ki aapne humko call kiya. Thank you very much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had given negative feedback.

- Customer says IndiaMART has no resolution.



Resolution:

- Executive called regarding negative feedback.

- Executive offered to discuss and resolve the issue.

- Customer refused resolution, stating lack of time.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, resolution, time
